---
title: delete_layer
---

Delete an anndata layer from one or more modalities.


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/transform/delete_layer/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name           |Description                                                           |Attributes                             |
|:--------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------|
|`--input`      |Input h5mu file                                                       |file, required, example: "input.h5mu"  |
|`--layer`      |Input layer to remove                                                 |string, required                       |
|`--output`     |Output h5mu file.                                                     |file, required, default: "output.h5mu" |
|`--missing_ok` |Do not raise an error if the layer does not exist for all modalities. |boolean_true                           |
:::
